pages.text: Long ago, the gold veins lying deep within the Earth were struck by a powerful curse. According to legend, a mighty druid, who had lost his son to human greed and avarice, sought revenge and, sacrificing himself, cast a vile curse that would bring terrible suffering to those who touched the bewitched gold. Centuries passed, the curse was lifted, but many metal deposits remained forever tainted.
Deep and infernal deposits of cursed gold, easily mined with a pickaxe.
